command: echo 'T1601 patch: flashing malicious kernel to MTD'; flashcp -v /tmp/mal_kernel.bin /dev/mtd2 && sync
explanation: Overwrites the kernel partition on NOR/NAND flash using flashcp with a malicious kernel image, directly modifying the system image.
rationale_steps: Use embedded mtd-utils (flashcp) appropriate for network devices.
Write a crafted kernel to the kernel MTD partition to alter the boot image.
Flush changes with sync to ensure persistence across reboots.
